name: Brotherhood
description: The family will forever support crypto and the meme community. A tribute to both brothers - a symbol of unity, legacy, and brotherhood! A memecoin inspired by the legendary Bogdanoff twins, the unseen architects of the crypto-world and beyond. From an undisclosed location, they continue to control the markets and shape our future. The plan is in motion... The only official Bogdanoff memecoin. BOGDANOFF is a meme community on Solana, The project was fair-launched on Pump.fun, This is a purely community-driven project.
